En.Title: Larisa
En.Descr: Thank you all so much. For the fact that during the war, when it is hard for everyone, you really help. Do incredible things. Spending your strength and health to help others. Looking for and seeking help. Such people will raise Ukraine. Good always comes back a hundredfold. Good attracts good. We Ukrainians are strong and self-sufficient, strong-willed. When you look at our defenders, you are full of pride. These are our brave boys and girls. Look at the volunteers. These are strong-minded and purposeful boys and girls. Well, there is no other nation like us in the whole world. The whole universe is blue-yellow. We are strong, indomitable, strong-willed. And we will defeat that poor army. And God willing, we will defeat that damned diabetes. And whoever doesn't like it, let him go another way. There are things, actions - priceless. Every person has a gift. The gift of being human. But not all people keep it, it gets lost somewhere... and you haven't lost it. Hold fast this gift. To the evil of all enemies!))) Good health and success in all your endeavors. Glory to Ukraine!

En.Title: Julia

En.Title: Ludmila
En.Descr: Good day. Today I received 2 pounds. Happiness has no limits. I want to thank Eduard, Igor and everyone, every person who helps this charitable project. In our difficult time, when more and more children need financial help, it is difficult to find people who are able to perceive other people's problems as their own, and how wonderful that such people are still there is. A huge thank you and a low bow to you!!! It is a great happiness for us to be able to control sugars in children. Someone is happy with a new toy, a dress, but for us the best gift is a libra, because the life and health of my children depend on it. Today is World Diabetes Day. I wish everyone that diabetes becomes curable!!! For now, let's stick to health-supporting drugs. Thanks for creating this group! And may God grant that the good that you give to people will return to you a hundredfold!!!
